[DONETSK REGION, UKRAINE - APRIL 8, 2022: Servicemen of the People‘s Militia of the Donetsk People‘s Republic stand guard in the embattled city of Mariupol. With tension escalating in Donbass in February, the Russian Armed Forces launched a special military operation in Ukraine in response to appeals for help from the Donetsk and Lugansk People‘s Republics.
